Last month, our Darren (Daz) McColl presented our storyscaping approach to attendees of Facebook Miami?s ?Building Brands in Today?s World with Today?s Consumers? session.  
  
Joaquin Molla from La Comunidad also joined a creative panel to discuss best practices and why creative design is essential to positioning brands in an optimal way to build awareness across all platforms and channels.

Connected Experiences are expected to dominate the next era of marketing. Most brands are committing the mistake of treating ?digital? and ?physical? worlds separately, while consumers don't make that distinction. Connected experiences help brands establish an emotional bond with consumers, beyond mere transactions.

The fifth theme in this series explores the world of connected experiences and how can we create experiences across different platforms.
Brands should adopt advanced consumer centric approach using digital technology @D_Chesnut http://t.co/5v7HOAd7bY

?Sie sind wirklich eine herausragende Vertreterin Ihrer Spezies!?
 
Mit diesen Worten würdigte Harald Huber (Vorstand ReTenCon AG)  Ute Maria Zankls (Director People Strategy, SapientNitro) Vortrag auf dem heutigen Münchner HR Kompetenzforum.
Vor knapp 80 HR Experten hielt Ute eine passionierte und inspirierende Rede zum Thema: ?Welche Wege führen zum Ziel der HR Excellence?? die mit großer Begeisterung vom Publikum aufgenommen wurde.
 
Dem positiven Feedback der Zuhörer und Organisatoren können wir uns nur anschließen: Großartiger Vortrag und wir freuen uns auf 2015!

RhinoCoders will immerse the young people of Metropolitan Detroit into the world of interactive architecture by providing them with a digital foundation from which to grow, from through a series of fun and interactive tracks taught by web developers from SapientNitro Detroit. Students will discover the latest cutting-edge technologies, learn how to code efficiently, develop stunning websites and create engaging apps.

Great job, Detroit team! Hear from some of our people about the initiative in this new video: http://bit.ly/1tqK0J0

München Marathon 2014 

Am Sonntag den 12. Oktober fällt der Startschuss für das Lauf-Highlight des Jahres - den 12. München Marathon.

Drei Teams von SapientNitro treten bei der Marathonstaffel gegeneinander an und geben alles für Ruhm und Läufer-Ehre.

Team Pixel Runners: 
Katharina Leonhardt, Alexandra Hlawatsch, Roger Bitterman und Clemens Weigel
Team Storyscapers: 
Tanja Moellmann, Marco Heusler, Barbara Neumaier und Georg Schuster
Team Digital Adventurers: 
Ann Eckert, Ollivier Bonnet, Deniz Uysal und Diana Seidl

Die Teams freuen sich auf Euren Support vor Ort wenn es heißt: ?Hier ist der Start, dort ist das Ziel. Dazwischen musst du Laufen? 
(Emil Zatopek).

This week on the SapientNitro blog, we're featuring the "Driving Adoption of Digital Initiatives" series, which covers the key factors marketing leaders should consider when implementing major digital marketing initiatives.

May be it isn?t just about finding your place in this world. Perhaps it?s about creating your own world.
 
The XT summit presented elements with which we can create our own world, where we can question the present and create the future. Swinging from Jarvis to archetron, from angular/node-based prototypes to natural language processing  APIs (native in browser)  or POV on JS frameworks, the summit had it all. The XT Summit offered unforgettable sparks of brilliance.  
 
Applauds of inspiration, laughter, excitement, and incredulity, were all present, apart from over 270 odd ?Experience Technologists? at SapientNitro?s flagship event ?The XTSummit?. The thinkers, creators, and geeks gathered on a single platform to chart out the future journey of Experience Technology at Sapient Studio in India.
 
Here is a glimpse of what happened, as we lived it.
 
This world is a lot different, but then it is our own !!
